RumorFact.Text: I found a frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.
Gravity crystals from the Gravity Crystal Workshop were used in the construction of something called the Inspired.
The Inspired used a lattice of gravity crystals to exploit something called the property of attraction.
The Interloper was used as the model for the Inspired.
A scroll in the Deep Storm Station reveals that the Inspired was built to bring destruction to the source of ghost matter.

AltText.Text: A scroll in the Deep Storm Station reveals that the Inspired was built to bring destruction to the source of the Interloper.

ExploreFact.Text: An artificial comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.
A Nomai named Cassava built the Inspired to bring great destruction to the source of ghost matter.

AltText.Text: A Nomai named Cassava built the Inspired to bring great destruction to the source of the Interloper.

ExploreFact.Text: The Inspired's construction used all available gravity crystals, and a white hole warp core powering the Deep Storm Station.

AltText.Text: The Inspired's construction used all available gravity crystals, and a white hole warp core powering the Deep Storm Station. Using a lattice of gravity crystals, it would exploit the property of attraction.

ExploreFact.Text: The Inspired's lattice is incomplete, with entry points at the front of the structure.
A Nomai named Cassava sent the Inspired towards Timber Hearth after making adjustments to it. He was determined to protect the native species.
The Inspired was kept in stationary orbit around Giant's Deep in case containment of ghost matter was breached.
